summary: One is a young, jazz-obsessed Japanese drifter and other is a black American GI on the lam in Tokyo. The two outsiders become outlaws and the movie depicts their growing bond as an alternately absurd and tragic culture clash.
cast: Tamio Kawaji|Chico Lourant|Yuko Chishiro|Hideji Ôtaki|Shôgen Nitta|Zenji Yamada|Tatsuya Fuji|Ryûsei Itô|Toshizô Kudô|Gô Kuroda|Hyôe Enoki|Tooru Togawa|Takashi Nomura|Yû Izumi|Katsumi Ishizaki|Masaaki Yamamoto|Hiroshi Atami|Hayato Tani|Yûzô Harumi|Kôji Sugiura|Toshihiko Oda|Yoshihiro Yamaguchi|Chigusa Takayama|Midori Mori|Kasumi Motegi|Shinji Sasaki|Yoshio Sugawara|Setsuko Watanabe|Minoru Nakane|Shinsuke Nagasawa
title: Kuroi taiyô
